attributes.background: The Interrail pass has enabled unlimited travel across Europe for 50 years. The decision of the Rail Delivery Group to pull out of this is truly shocking. Brexit or no Brexit, UK participation in Interrail must be saved.

rejection.details:
In any case, the Rail Delivery Group has now announced that it will be remaining part of both the Interrail and Eurail passes. You can see the announcement here:

https://www.raildeliverygroup.com/media-centre/press-releases/2019/469775896-2019-08-08.html
